summary: This document contains the consent of the Board of Directors of Southern Trust Company, Inc. and Financial Informatics, Inc., detailing resolutions adopted regarding corporate actions, including the transfer of shares and a merger. It highlights Jeffrey Epstein's role as a significant shareholder and officer in both corporations.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is the sole shareholder of Southern Trust Company, Inc. and serves as President of Financial Informatics, Inc.
Darren K. Indyke and Richard Kahn are both directors in both corporations.
The document outlines the merger of Financial Trust Company, Inc. into Southern Financial, LLC.
The resolutions were adopted unanimously by the Board of Directors.
The document indicates that the merger is intended to qualify as a tax-free reorganization.
